name: Satin Regent Co-ord
description: Made from luxurious satin cotton, this deep green co-ord set blends subtle sheen with a structured fit, exuding quiet confidence. The rich jewel tone and smooth finish bring a vintage aristocratic air, perfect for those who appreciate timeless style over fleeting trends. Designed for comfort without sacrificing elegance, it's a statement in understated luxury.
longDescription: Made from luxurious satin cotton, this deep green co-ord set blends subtle sheen with a structured fit, exuding quiet confidence. The rich jewel tone and smooth finish bring a vintage aristocratic air, perfect for those who appreciate timeless style over fleeting trends. Designed for comfort without sacrificing elegance, it's a statement in understated luxury.

name: Shamray Estate Co-ord
description: Crafted from premium Indian Shamray, this beige co-ord set channels effortless sophistication with a relaxed yet refined silhouette. Its lightweight weave drapes elegantly, making it perfect for warm days when style still matters. The understated hue and sharp tailoring give off an old-money charm that never tries too hard – it simply speaks for itself.
longDescription: Crafted from premium Indian Shamray, this beige co-ord set channels effortless sophistication with a relaxed yet refined silhouette. Its lightweight weave drapes elegantly, making it perfect for warm days when style still matters. The understated hue and sharp tailoring give off an old-money charm that never tries too hard – it simply speaks for itself.

name: Afsanay
description: Wrap yourself in culture with our “All About Tradition Vibe” oversized tee. Featuring a striking Persian rug–inspired design and bold Urdu typography, it’s where heritage meets street style. Made from soft, breathable fabric for all-day comfort, this piece makes a statement without saying a word. Perfect for those who wear their roots with pride.
longDescription: Wrap yourself in culture with our “All About Tradition Vibe” oversized tee. Made from soft, breathable fabric for all-day comfort, this piece makes a statement without saying a word. Perfect for those who wear their roots with pride.

name: Raah-e-Manzil
description: Volume One - The Beginning of SOCH Introducing our debut drop: Volume One - a bold expression of minimal design and rich culture. Crafted with 100% premium cotton this limited-edition drop-shoulder T-shirt brings comfort and streetwear elegance together
longDescription: Volume One - The Beginning of SOCH Introducing our debut drop: Volume One - a bold expression of minimal design and rich culture. Crafted with 100% premium cotton this limited-edition drop-shoulder T-shirt brings comfort and streetwear elegance together

name: Éclat Royale-Impression of Creed Aventus
description: Éclat Royale – The Essence of Power & Prestige
longDescription:
Step into a world of sophistication with Éclat Royale, a masterful impression of the legendary Creed Aventus. Crafted for those who desire the commanding presence of the original without the extravagant price tag, Éclat Royale delivers luxury within reach.

With its bold, fruity opening of pineapple, blackcurrant, and bergamot, it immediately captures attention. The heart reveals a refined blend of jasmine and patchouli, balanced with a whisper of dry birch, while the base settles into rich notes of oakmoss, ambergris, and vanilla — a scent profile that speaks of power, elegance, and timeless appeal.

Whether you're making a decisive move in the boardroom or leaving a lasting impression at an evening affair, Éclat Royale ensures you carry an aura of confidence and allure — without compromising on value.
features: Luxury for less – enjoy the iconic Aventus-inspired scent at a fraction of the cost
Premium longevity & projection – designed to linger and turn heads
Versatile elegance – perfect for both day and night wear

name: Roselina-Impression of Delina
description: Roselina – The Bloom of Modern Elegance
longDescription:
Indulge in a fragrance that whispers romance yet commands attention. Roselina is an exquisite interpretation of the iconic Delina — offering the same captivating charm at a price that makes luxury beautifully accessible.

Opening with sparkling notes of lychee, rhubarb, and bergamot, Roselina greets you with a burst of freshness that feels both playful and refined. At its heart, Turkish rose blooms in harmony with peony and lily-of-the-valley, creating a bouquet that's irresistibly feminine. The base wraps you in cashmere-soft musk, creamy vanilla, and a hint of vetiver, leaving a trail as delicate as it is unforgettable.

Whether for an afternoon garden party or an intimate evening affair, Roselina lets you carry the elegance of French perfumery without the indulgent price tag.
features: Luxury within reach – the Delina-inspired scent you adore, at a fraction of the cost
Unmistakably feminine & romantic – a fragrance that turns moments into memories
Long-lasting allure – crafted to linger gracefully from morning to night
